page.title: 11U. F. O.
page.content: Bob Taylor is a quiet phlegmatic Scot but on the{9th November 1979}he was incredibly affected by the sight of a {spaceship}in a clearing at{Deer Hill. It was a dark,grey dome with a flanged rim. Two spiked spheres appeared and seized Mr.Taylor. The only sound was a sucking,plopping noise but a strong acrid smell filled the air and rendered him unconscious. He awoke to hear his dog barking and he recollects hearing a whirring noise.The{spaceship had disappeared. He could neither walk nor talk. The incident was reported to his boss and his doctor who were shown where it had occurred. Tracks were left on the spot but none in or out of the clearing. This is a classic case of a{"Close Encounter of the Second {Kind".
